NAME: primary -Cl3
REMARK: chlorine (attached to a primary carbon with 2 other chlorine atoms attached)

NAME: primary -Cl2
REMARK: chlorine (attached to a primary carbon with 1 other chlorine atom attached)

NAME: secondary -Cl2
REMARK: chlorine (attached to a secondary carbon with 1 other chlorine atom attached)

NAME: primary -Cl
REMARK: chlorine (attached to a primary carbon with 0 other chlorine atoms attached)

NAME: secondary -Cl
REMARK: chlorine (attached to a secondary carbon with 0 other chlorine atoms attached)

NAME: tertiary -Cl
REMARK: chlorine (attached to a tertiary carbon with 0 other chlorine atoms attached)

NAME: ring -OPO3-
REMARK: middle link in a phosphate chain (participating in a ring)

NAME: N-PO3
REMARK: terminal phosphate group attached to nitrogen

NAME: C-PO3
REMARK: terminal phosphate group attached to carbon

NAME: ring -n<
REMARK: double bond and one single bond participating in a ring

NAME: ring =N<
REMARK: double bond and one single bond participating in a ring

NAME: two fused rings >C<
REMARK: quaternary carbon participating in two fused nonaromatic rings

NAME: two fused rings -C<
REMARK: tertiary carbon participating in two fused nonaromatic rings

NAME: two fused rings =C<
REMARK: participating in two fused nonaromatic rings

NAME: two fused rings =c<
REMARK: participating in two fused aromatic rings

NAME: ring >c=
REMARK: one single bond and one double bond participating in an aromatic ring

NAME: ring >C=
REMARK: one single bond and one double bond participating in a nonaromatic ring

NAME: vicinal Cl correction
REMARK: vicinal Cl correction (not 100% accurate, but currently no examples)

NAME: three member ring correction
REMARK: three member ring correction (currently no examples)
